name: Soulwell
description:
Soulwell is a short experimental game that was created to make the player feel a range of emotion. This game is designed to help take the player from happiness to sadness.

You are taking a walk through the woods with another, as you explore, you realise the woods aren't all they appear to be.

Developed for my 4th trimester in my Games Design Degree, at SAEQ Brisbane.
